title: Immigration Judges Purge - Replacing Experienced Judges with Loyalists
summary: Nearly 100 immigration judges fired in 2025, with experienced professionals replaced by inexperienced loyalists. Courts starting 2026 with fewer than half the judges from a year ago.
keyFacts: At least 19 experienced judges who had been with agency for years terminated
Union estimated over 100 judges have either been fired or resigned
Courts starting 2026 with fewer than half the judges from a year ago
Trump administration hiring inexperienced immigration judges to replace experienced professionals
San Francisco immigration court being shuttered
Justice Jackson raised concerns about 'a President come in and fire all the scientists and the doctors... and replacing them with loyalists'
Immigration courts facing massive backlog with fewer experienced judges
